jodd.decora.parser

Class DecoraParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.decora.parser.DecoraParser

  • public class DecoraParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Decora parser takes page content and puts it into decorator template, to produce the output. Important: Decora templates do not support raw tags, since Decora tags may be placed inside. Decora parser does not depend on servlets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DecoraParser()

      Parses decorator file and collects Decora tags used in template.

      Parses target page and extracts Decora regions for replacements.

      Writes decorated content.
      protected void writeRegion(java.io.Writer out, char[] pageContent, DecoraTag decoraTag, DecoraTag[] decoraTags)

              throws java.io.IOException
        Decorates page content with decorator template and outputs the result.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • parseDecorator

        protected DecoraTag[] parseDecorator(char[] decoraContent)
        Parses decorator file and collects Decora tags used in template. Returned Decora tags have start and end index set, but their region is not set.

      • parsePage

        protected void parsePage(char[] pageContent,
                         DecoraTag[] decoraTags)
        Parses target page and extracts Decora regions for replacements.

      • writeDecoratedPage
